Sentencas: Iron-chromium ferritic stainless steel is widely used in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) components.
Titulo: Chromium transport by solid state diffusion on solid oxide fuel cell cathode

Sentencas: At 650-800 degrees C, stainless steels form a protective chromia oxide scale.
Titulo: Chromium transport by solid state diffusion on solid oxide fuel cell cathode

Sentencas: This low conductivity catalytic compound can degrade SOFC cathode performance.
Titulo: Chromium transport by solid state diffusion on solid oxide fuel cell cathode

Sentencas: The migration of Cr species onto the cathode occurs through vapor transport and/or solid state diffusion, and electrochemical reactions may affect the migration.
Titulo: Chromium transport by solid state diffusion on solid oxide fuel cell cathode

Sentencas: It is important to understand the relative Cr transport and reaction rates to evaluate the most viable commercially available cathode material.
Titulo: Chromium transport by solid state diffusion on solid oxide fuel cell cathode

Sentencas: This study characterizes the migration of Cr species through solid state diffusion and vapor deposition.
Titulo: Chromium transport by solid state diffusion on solid oxide fuel cell cathode

Sentencas: Chromia blocks and chromia-forming stainless steel interconnects were held in contact with LSM (Lanthanum Strontium Manganese Oxide), LSCF (Lanthanum Strontium Cobalt Ferrite) and LNF (Lanthanum Nickel Ferrite) perovskite pellets in Cr-saturated air at 700 degrees C for 300 h. XRD (X-ray Diffraction), SEM (Scanning Electron Microscope), EDS (Energy Dispersive X-ray Spectroscopy) and Ion Milling by FIB (Focused Ion Beam) were used to detect Cr on and within the perovskite pellets.
Titulo: Chromium transport by solid state diffusion on solid oxide fuel cell cathode

Sentencas: Cr transport and reaction on LSCF is the most severe, followed by LSM.
Titulo: Chromium transport by solid state diffusion on solid oxide fuel cell cathode

Sentencas: Cr transport is observed on LNF, but without noticeable reaction.
Titulo: Chromium transport by solid state diffusion on solid oxide fuel cell cathode
